doc:
Michael Cudlitz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Cudlitz 0 Michael Cudlitz (born December 29, 1964) is an American actor, known for portraying John Cooper on the TNT drama series Southland, Sergeant Denver "Bull" Randleman on the HBO miniseries Band of Brothers, and Sergeant Abraham Ford on the AMC horror series The Walking Dead. Michael_Cudlitz ( born December_29_,_1964 ) is an_American_actor , known for portraying John_Cooper on the_TNT_drama_series_Southland , Sergeant_Denver_"_Bull_"_Randleman on the_HBO_miniseries_Band of Brothers , and Sergeant_Abraham_Ford on the_AMC_horror_series The_Walking_Dead .
